verses.name: Luke 1:28
verses.text: And the angel came in unto her, and said, Hail, thou that art highly favoured, the Lord is with thee: blessed art thou among women.

verses.name: Luke 1:29
verses.text: And when she saw him, she was troubled at his saying, and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be.

verses.name: Luke 1:30
verses.text: And the angel said unto her, Fear not, Mary: for thou hast found favour with God.

verses.name: Luke 1:31
verses.text: And, behold, thou shalt conceive in thy womb, and bring forth a son, and shalt call his name JESUS.
